title: Exception throws when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell
description: When exporting data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
OB: When attempting to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: The exception should not be thrown when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a grid. 2. Insert a table inside a grid cell. 3. Attempt to export the data in the table and observe if an exception is thrown.
